works.description:
I am Medha Raghunath. I happened to get
to  
know that a few personal photographs of mine are on your website. After  
consulting with my lawyers and the Tamil Nadu Police department I was  
advised to write to you regarding this issue. I own full and complete  
rights to these images and these are not for public viewing. I would  
appreciate it very much if you could remove them from your website as this
 
is causing me a lot of unwanted problems in my life, mental trauma and  
amounts to an invasion of my privacy. These are private pictures and I
have  
never given permission to any person to use these photographs on a public 

forum.
Thanking you in anticipation of your compliance.
